name: Survive... Or Die
description:
Survive or Die - Full Edition

You're being chased by hordes of rangers and vampires. You have to dodge them and stay alive for as long as you can. There are a bunch of things that can help you survive!

Arrow keys or WASD to move. SPACE key to talk to NPCs. Click on close enemies to attack them.

Main challenges (v1.0)

Activate the towers in the NE and SW.
